page.title: 10STH WINGFIELD _ CHILD'S PLAY
page.content: This is a list of present day {playground singing games}:_ "Farmer, farmer may we cross your golden river" "Cat's got the Measles" "Farmer's in his den" "Orange ball" "Poor Mary sits a weeping" This is how the "Farmer, farmer..." game is played:_ One child is the farmer and the others stand in a line and sing the question to him. The farmer will only let children cross the river if they are wearing the colour he has chosen. The other children are chased by the farmer. Other children play ball games such as football, chasing games, skipping games and hopscotch.
